alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bostwick, or 7 miles northwest of Hastings, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Hastings, East Palatka, Bostwick, Orange Mills and Federal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
